drawPeerActionSelectBox

protected void drawPeerActionSelectBox(HTMLNode peerForm,
                                       boolean advancedModeEnabled)
Description copied from class: ConnectionsToadlet
If showPeerActionsBox() is true, this will be called directly after drawing the peers table. A form has been added, and checkboxes added for each peer. This function should draw the rest of the form - any additional controls and one or more submit buttons.

Specified by:
drawPeerActionSelectBox in class ConnectionsToadlet
